sorry if I missed it elsewhere, but we said that until the service correctly sends a non-null value in valueSelectionMark, we would return value.text in the meantime. Does this code do that?
You mean set the value i.e SELECTED / UNSELECTED to value.text?

I might have commented in the wrong place, but since for a FormField, valueSelectionMark is returning null, we can in the meantime return the text value for a FormField.value. In python, this would be the string "selected" or "unselected" but maybe this would be an enum in Java
